caption: This is a live performance of a religious song. There is a male vocalist singing melodically as the lead. The main melody is being played by the keyboard with the electric guitar and the bass guitar in the background. The rhythmic background is provided by the electronic drums and the electronic percussion. The piece has movements reminiscent of Jewish music.
